name: strimjs
description: A library that manage localstorage and indexDB

scripts.build: npm test && npm run lint && npm run check && npm run clean && npm run uglify
scripts.uglify: mkdir -p dist && uglifyjs lib/stopwords.js > dist/stopwords.min.js && uglifyjs lib/keywaurdit.js > dist/keywaurdit.min.js && head -7 lib/keywaurdit.js |cat - dist/keywaurdit.min.js > dist/temp && mv dist/temp dist/keywaurdit.min.js && head -7 lib/stopwords.js |cat - dist/stopwords.min.js > dist/temp2 && mv dist/temp2 dist/stopwords.min.js

author: Stephel Maca <stephelgeorgemaca@gmail.com>
